resources.string: We Arshil and Zain are First Year Students of Jamia Millia Islamia And have Made this MSquare App to bring ease to the people in buying medicines and furthermore in calculating BMI,BP and Incase of Emergency then can see our First Aid Section for First AID. The Code for the whole App Can Be found on https://github.com/Arshilgenius/MSquare and If you like you can Contribute to my repository
